Charminar

Charminar Rd,char kaman,Ghansi Bazaar,Hyderabad

Opening hours

Monday - Friday : 7:00am - 7:00pm

Saturday - Sunday: 8:00am - 5:00pm

Popular for :

 Irani Chai  Laad Bazaar  Shadab Hotel 

Location map

Customer Reviews

Yogesh21 Augesh 2023

What a great place. I can't say enough good things about it.

Vijay16 June 2023

It was great. Chai is so tasty, crowd is full

Charminar is famous for its intricate architecture, which makes it one of the most recognized structures of India. The surrounding Laad Bazaar and the 400 years old mosque on the top floor of Charminar make it famous amongst locals as well as the tourists.

If you've been and you like it - or if you don't - please leave a review to help other people just like you.
